content:
InputMethod Class

Definition

Provides facilities for managing and interacting with the Text Services Framework, which provides support for alternate text input methods such as speech and handwriting.

In this Article

public class InputMethod : System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Inheritance
Object
System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
InputMethod

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)

ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Dispatcher
VerifyAccess()

Fields

InputScopeProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope* attached property.

public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty InputScopeProperty;

IsInputMethodEnabledProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled* attached property.

public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsInputMethodEnabledProperty;

IsInputMethodSuspendedProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended* attached property.

public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsInputMethodSuspendedProperty;

Identifies the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode* attached property.

public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty PreferredImeConversionModeProperty;

PreferredImeSentenceModeProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode* attached property.

public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty PreferredImeSentenceModeProperty;

PreferredImeStateProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState* attached property.

public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty PreferredImeStateProperty;

Properties

CanShowConfigurationUI

Gets a value that indicates whether or not this input method can display configuration user interface (UI).

public bool CanShowConfigurationUI { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if configuration UI can be displayed; otherwise, false.

This property has no default value.

CanShowRegisterWordUI

Gets a value that indicates whether this input method can display word registration user interface (UI).

public bool CanShowRegisterWordUI { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if word registration UI can be displayed; otherwise, false.

This property has no default value.

Current

Gets a reference to any currently active input method associated with the current context.

public static System.Windows.Input.InputMethod Current { get; }
Value
InputMethod

A reference to an InputMethod object associated with the current context, or null if there is no active input method.

This property has no default value.

HandwritingState

Gets or sets the current state of handwriting input for this input method.

public System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState HandwritingState { get; set; }
Value
InputMethodState

A member of the InputMethodState enumeration specifying the current input method state for handwriting input.

The default value is InputMethodState.

ImeConversionMode

Gets or sets the current conversion mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.

public System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues ImeConversionMode { get; set; }
Value
ImeConversionModeValues

A member of the ImeConversionModeValues enumeration specifying the conversion mode.

The default value is ImeConversionModeValues.

ImeSentenceMode

Gets or sets the current sentence mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.

public System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues ImeSentenceMode { get; set; }
Value
ImeSentenceModeValues

A member of the ImeSentenceModeValues enumerations specifying the sentence mode.

The default value is ImeSentenceModeValues.

ImeState

Gets or sets the current state of the input method editor associated with this input method.

public System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState ImeState { get; set; }
Value
InputMethodState

A member of the InputMethodState enumeration specifying the state of the input method editor associated with this input method.

The default value is InputMethodState.

MicrophoneState

Gets or sets the current state of microphone input for this input method.

public System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState MicrophoneState { get; set; }
Value
InputMethodState

A member of the InputMethodState enumeration specifying the current input method state for microphone input.

The default value is InputMethodState.

SpeechMode

Gets or sets the speech mode for this input method.

public System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode SpeechMode { get; set; }
Value
SpeechMode

A member of the SpeechMode enumeration specifying the current speech mode.

The default value is SpeechMode.

ShowConfigureUI()

Displays configuration user interface (UI) associated with the currently active keyboard text service.

public void ShowConfigureUI ();

ShowConfigureUI(UIElement)

Displays configuration user interface (UI) associated with the currently active keyboard text service, using a specified UIElement as the parent element for the configuration UI.

public void ShowConfigureUI (System.Windows.UIElement element);
element
UIElement

A UIElement that will be used as the parent element for the configuration UI. This parameter can be null.

ShowRegisterWordUI()

Displays word registration user interface (UI) associated with the currently active keyboard text service.

public void ShowRegisterWordUI ();

ShowRegisterWordUI(String)

Displays word registration user interface (UI) associated with the currently active keyboard text service. Accepts a specified string as the default value to register.

public void ShowRegisterWordUI (string registeredText);
registeredText
String

A string that specifies a value to register.

Remarks

Typically the value specified by registeredText is used to pre-populate the word registration user interface (UI).

ShowRegisterWordUI(UIElement,String)

Displays word registration user interface (UI) associated with the currently active keyboard text service. Accepts a specified string as the default value to register, and a specified UIElement as the parent element for the configuration UI.

public void ShowRegisterWordUI (System.Windows.UIElement element, string registeredText);
element
UIElement

A UIElement that will be used as the parent element for the word registration UI. This parameter can be null.

registeredText
String

A string that specifies a value to register.

Remarks

Typically the value specified by registeredText is used to pre-populate the word registration user interface (UI).

Events

StateChanged

Occurs when the input method state (represented by the stem.Windows.Input.InputMethod.ImeState* property) changes.

public event System.Windows.Input.InputMethodStateChangedEventHandler StateChanged;
